CrbnCreditProject.name: CrbnCreditProject
CrbnCreditProject.description: Represents information about the environmental project that generates carbon credits by removing greenhouse gasses or preventing a certain quantity of greenhouse gasses from being released.

AdditionalBenefits.description: Specifies the additional benefits related to the carbon credit project.

Country.description: The country in which the carbon credit project is implemented.

CrbnCrMethodology.description: The method that's used to adjust the carbon credits during the lifecycle of the project.

Description.description: The description of the carbon credit project.

DeveloperAccountId.description: The account of an organization that develops the emissions reduction project and provides the carbon credits.

ExternalIdentifier.description: The external identifier of the data that is imported for the carbon credit project.

FundedBy.description: The name of the organization that's funding the carbon credit project.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

MitigationType.description: Specifies the mitigation strategy associated with this carbon credit project.

Name.description: The name of the environmental project that generates carbon credits by removing greenhouse gases or preventing a certain quantity of greenhouse gases from being released.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

ProjRegistryIdentifier.description: The unique identifier that's assigned by the registry to the carbon credit project.

ProjectType.description: Specifies the type of the carbon credit project.

ProjectUrl.description: The URL that contains the carbon credit project details.

Region.description: The region within the country where the carbon credit project is implemented.

StandardsAgencyName.description: Specifies the organization name that defines the standards for voluntary emissions reduction credits.

TotalCrbnCrAllocInTco2e.description: The total carbon credits allocated for the carbon credit project, which is a cumulative value of all the associated sustainability credits.

TotalCrbnCrAvlInTco2e.description: The total carbon credits available for the carbon credit project.

TotalCrbnCrPurchInTco2e.description: The total carbon credit purchased for the carbon credit project, which is a cumulative value of all the associated sustainability credits.

TotalSpend.description: The total spend for the carbon credit project, which is a cumulative value of all the associated sustainability credits.

VerifiedBy.description: The name of the organization that verified the carbon credit project.

VoluntaryRegistryName.description: The name of the registry that lists the carbon credit projects.
